Package seng201.team53.game.items

Class Shop

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.items.Shop
public class Shop extends Object
This class represents the shop. It stores the players money, determines if an item can be bought and handles selling of items

  • Method Details

    • getMoneyProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty getMoneyProperty()
      Retrieves the money property. This property is observable, meaning it can be watched for changes
      Returns:
      The money property

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      Retrieves the players money
      Returns:
      The amount of money the player has

    • purchaseItem

      public boolean purchaseItem(Purchasable item)
      Attempt to purchase an item from the shop
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be purchased
      Returns:
      True if the item was successfuly purchased from the shop, and the player's money was adjusted. False if the player did not have enough balance to purchase the item.

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem(Purchasable item)
      Sells a purchasable item and adds the sell price to the players balance
      Parameters:
      item - The item to sell

    • subtractMoney

      public void subtractMoney(int amount)
      Subtract an amount of money from the player's balance. The balance will not go below zero.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of money to subtract

    • addMoney

      public void addMoney(int amount)
      Increases the player's balance by a given amount
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to increase the players balance
